verses.name: Joshua 12:14
verses.text: The king of Hormah, one; the king of Arad, one;

verses.name: Joshua 12:15
verses.text: The king of Libnah, one; the king of Adullam, one;

verses.name: Joshua 12:16
verses.text: The king of Makkedah, one; the king of Beth–el, one;

verses.name: Joshua 12:17
verses.text: The king of Tappuah, one; the king of Hepher, one;

verses.name: Joshua 12:18
verses.text: The king of Aphek, one; the king of Lasharon, one;

verses.name: Joshua 12:19
verses.text: The king of Madon, one; the king of Hazor, one;

verses.name: Joshua 12:20
verses.text: The king of Shimron–meron, one; the king of Achshaph, one;

verses.name: Joshua 12:21
verses.text: The king of Taanach, one; the king of Megiddo, one;

verses.name: Joshua 12:22
verses.text: The king of Kedesh, one; the king of Jokneam of Carmel, one;
